thread.title: POLITICO: Rep. Ellmers thanks GOP members for support after ‘nasty emails’
thread.title_full: POLITICO: Rep. Ellmers thanks GOP members for support after ‘nasty emails’ - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: POLITICO: Rep. Ellmers thanks GOP members for support after ‘nasty emails’
text: The news organization POLITICO reports that North Carolina Congresswoman Renee Ellmers , in a private meeting of Republican legislators on Friday, acknowledged that “nasty emails” had been circulating that accused her of having an affair
